insertCountry: INSERT INTO direction.country (na_country) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id_country
insertState: INSERT INTO direction.state (id_country, na_state) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_state
insertCity: INSERT INTO direction.city (id_state, na_city) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_city
insertMuni: INSERT INTO direction.municipality (id_city, na_municipality) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_municipality
insertStreet: INSERT INTO direction.street (id_municipality, na_street) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_street
selectDirectionByRoute: SELECT na_street, na_municipality, na_city, na_state, na_country FROM route INNER JOIN
updateMuni: UPDATE direction.municipality SET na_municipality = $1 WHERE id_municipality = $2
updateStreet: UPDATE direction.street SET na_street = $1 WHERE id_street = $2
